message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking it's worth a bit more than $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $140. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still think the product is worth a bit more than $130. I'm willing to go up to $135, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to go down to $135, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $128?
I'm not willing to go down to $128, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $128 and $135, which is $131.50. I think that's a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still think the product is worth more than $125. I'm willing to go up a bit from $125, but not much. I'll meet you at $128.50. That's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $128.50, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
